title: Can he wear pants BELOW the ankle to cover a medical condition preventing him from wearing shoes?
transcript: Ahmed from the usum sh so I have a medical condition called club feet which prevents me from wearing shoes and I wear my pants long to cover them uh is this permissible or am I simple this is not permissible at all because if you can't wear shoes you can stay barefooted and there's no problem in that when you wear your trousers Beyond and below your ankles as if you want to satisfy the people so that you won't feel ashamed on the account of angering Allah who prohibited this for you no this is not permissible at all what
